sense.def: Pathological Mechanism identical with xia zhu 下注 , downward influx. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 10: 治風腰脚疼 痛，下疰脚膝，行步不得 , 或腫癢，或在兩膝腫痛，久療不瘥，漸至足脛 細小少力，虎骨散方 , “To cure wind with painful lower back and legs, downward attachment-illness in the legs and knees, with an inability to walk, sometimes accompanied by swelling and itching, sometimes with the two knees swelling and aching, which cannot be healed for a long time and gradually results in an emaciation and loss of strength of the feet and shins, [use] the recipe for the powder with tiger bones”.
